query: UPDATE customers SET address = '123 Pharmaceutical Ave, Windhoek, Namibia', primary_contact_name = 'John Doe', primary_contact_phone = '+264 61 234 5678', primary_contact_email = 'orders@customer.com.na', accounts_contact_name = 'Jane Smith', accounts_contact_phone = '+264 61 234 5679', accounts_contact_email = 'accounts@customer.com.na', account_manager = 'Sarah Williams', payment_due_date = DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) WHERE address IS NULL OR address = '';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3PHp7ztbFBNkDxM.root --database fwhU47bCmMHPtMZqQZK4Tp --execute UPDATE customers SET address = '123 Pharmaceutical Ave, Windhoek, Namibia', primary_contact_name = 'John Doe', primary_contact_phone = '+264 61 234 5678', primary_contact_email = 'orders@customer.com.na', accounts_contact_name = 'Jane Smith', accounts_contact_phone = '+264 61 234 5679', accounts_contact_email = 'accounts@customer.com.na', account_manager = 'Sarah Williams', payment_due_date = DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) WHERE address IS NULL OR address = '';
